    def solve(N,A):
        max_val = A[-1]
        count_max = A.count(max_val)
        if count_max <2:
            return [-1]
        first_max = A.index(max_val)
        ans = [0]*N
        for i in range(N):
            if A[i] == max_val:
                ans[i] = first_max +1
            else:
                ans[i] = i+1
        return ans
